code:
stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR

    [HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> NEW: Thread created
    NEW --> RUNNABLE: thread.start(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

    subgraph Thread Scheduler
        RUNNABLE
        RUNNING
    end

    RUNNABLE --> RUNNING: CPU time allocated
    RUNNING --> RUNNABLE: Yield / Time slice end

    RUNNING --> BLOCKED: Enters synchronized block
    BLOCKED --> RUNNABLE: Exits synchronized block

    RUNNING --> WAITING: object.wait(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
    WAITING --> RUNNABLE: object.notify(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) / notifyAll(HealthTech_PatientRecords)

    RUNNING --> TIMED_WAITING: Thread.sleep(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) / object.wait(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
    TIMED_WAITING --> RUNNABLE: Timeout / notify(HealthTech_PatientRecords)

    RUNNING --> TERMINATED: run(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) completes
    TERMINATED --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
repo_description: Project for all the article details I have learn day by day
